definition: Lingbao county level city in Sanmenxia 三門峽|三门峡[San1 men2 xia2], Henan
Lingbao county level city in Sanmenxia 三門峽|三门峡[San1 men2 xia2], Henan
treasure of spirits/Silmarillion or Quenta Silmarillion by J.R.R. Tolkien 托爾金|托尔金

sentences.english: The general characteristics of greenstone type gold deposits in Lingbao area of HenanProvince have been analysed in the paper.
sentences.chinese: 本文分析了河南灵宝地区绿岩型金矿一般地质特征。

sentences.english: If you come here you will be served by Lingbao people.
sentences.chinese: 如果你来那里，你会受到灵宝人热情的接待。

sentences.english: I study at No. 1 Primary School of Lingbao city.
sentences.chinese: 我在灵宝市第一小学上学。

sentences.english: I study at No. 2 Primary School of Lingbao city.
sentences.chinese: 我在灵宝市第二小学上学。

sentences.english: From lingbao , to be good at flute and cucurbit flute.
sentences.chinese: 来自灵宝市，擅长长笛葫芦丝。

sentences.english: The numinous treasure rites are the mainstream of Taoist rites.
sentences.chinese: 灵宝斋法是道教斋法的主流。

definition: time immemorial/origin of the universe/the world

records/book/Taoist written charm/book of prophecy (e.g. of dynastic fortunes)
